name: Table of contents
description:
使用方法

1. 选中 1 个 FRAME 图层

2. 运行插件

3. 将与选中图层名称相同的图层构建目录


1. 选中多个 FRAME 图层

2. 运行插件

3. 将选中的图层构建目录


How to use it

1. Select the FRAME layer

2. Run the plug-in

3. Build a catalog of layers with the same name as the selected layer


1. Select multiple FRAME layers

2. Run the plugin

3. Build the table of contents of the selected layer
